data_table.description: This pedigree data table contains family relationships in the format of family IDs, subject IDs, father IDs, mother IDs, subject's sex, and twin IDs for monozygotic twins.

variable.name: FAMILY_ID
variable.comment: Additional second-degree and higher relationships could not be uniquely specified and are not represented by this pedigree.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.comment: Additional second-degree and higher relationships could not be uniquely specified and are not represented by this pedigree.

variable.name: MOTHER_ID
variable.comment: Additional second-degree and higher relationships could not be uniquely specified and are not represented by this pedigree.

variable.name: FATHER_ID
variable.comment: Additional second-degree and higher relationships could not be uniquely specified and are not represented by this pedigree.

variable.name: SEX
variable.comment: Additional second-degree and higher relationships could not be uniquely specified and are not represented by this pedigree.

variable.name: TWIN_ID
variable.comment: Additional second-degree and higher relationships could not be uniquely specified and are not represented by this pedigree.
